name: bibi
description: Bibi | EPUB Reader on your website.

scripts.develop: node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js reset && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --mode development
scripts.develop+watch: node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js reset && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --mode development --watch
scripts.develop+bc: node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js reset --bc && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --mode development --bc
scripts.develop+bc+watch: node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js reset --bc && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --mode development --bc --watch
scripts.build: node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js reset && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --mode production
scripts.build+watch: node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js reset && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --mode production --watch
scripts.build+bc: node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js reset --bc && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --mode production --bc
scripts.build+bc+watch: node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js reset --bc && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --mode production --bc --watch
scripts.build+pack: node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js reset --pack && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --mode production --pack
scripts.make:package: npm run build+pack && node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js make:package && node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js clean --pack
scripts.make:package+bc: npm run build+pack && node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js make:package && node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js make:package --bc && node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js clean --pack
scripts.demo: npm run build+bc && npm run serve
